ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var JsDom = Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup;
var Document = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Document;
var Element = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Element;
            
var document = JsDom.parse(src);
            
// 获取包含<li>元素的<div>元素
var divs = document.select('ul.list > div');

// 将divs转换为数组以便排序
var divArray = [];
for (var i = 0; i < divs.size(); i++) {
    divArray.push(divs.get(i));
}

// 按照data-id属性对divArray进行排序
divArray.sort(function(a, b) {
    var pageA = parseInt(a.attr('data-id'), 10);
    var pageB = parseInt(b.attr('data-id'), 10);
    return pageA - pageB;
});

var list = [];
// 遍历排序后的divArray
for (var i = 0; i < divArray.length; i++) {
    var div = divArray[i];
    var dataId = div.attr('data-id');
    // 获取当前div下的所有<li>元素
    var lis = div.select('li');
    for (var j = 0; j < lis.size(); j++) {
        var li = lis.get(j);
        var a = li.select('a').first();
        if (a != null) {
            list.push({
                text: a.text(),
                id: dataId, // 使用data-id属性
                url: a.attr('href')
            });
        }
    }
}

//java.log(JSON.stringify(list));
list;
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var bes = result.match(/PGJyIC8\+[A-Za-z0-9+\/]+={0,2}/g);
//java.log(String(bes))
if (!bes) {
    var ml = java.webView(null,baseUrl,null);
    var txt = java.getString("#txt@html");
    java.longToast("正文解密失败，转为webView动态加载。");
} else {
var result = [];
for (var i = 0; i < bes.length; i++) {
    // 遍历数组，使用阅读内置Base64解码方法
    var bsej = java.base64Decode(bes[i]);
    var txtt = String(bsej);
    result.push(txtt);
      }
	var txt = result.join('\n');
}
txt;
</js>

{{@@[property$=chapter_name]@content}}
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))

searchUrl:
https://m.hjbook.com/search.php?keyword={{key}}&submit=
@js:
u="https://m.hjbook.com/search.php?keyword=submit="
loc=java.get(u,{})
lo=String(loc.headers("location"||"Location")).replace(/\[(.*)\]/,"$1")
code=loc.statusCode()
if(code>=301){
uu=source.key+lo
java.log(uu)
re=java.ajax(uu)
java.log(uu)
na=re.match(/" name="(.*)" v/)[1]
va=re.match(/value="(.*)"\/\>/)[1]
no=re.match(/bute\("value","(.*)"\),d/)[1]
bd=`${na}=${va}&nonce=${no}`
java.log(bd)
url=source.key+"/search.php?keyword={{key}}&submit=,"+JSON.stringify({
  "body": bd,
  "method": "POST",
    	})}else{url=source.key+"/search.php?keyword={{key}}&submit="}

.replace("••","")

.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')

.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')

bookSourceComment:
//2025.4.18 YooY修复
// 这是在源仓库找的书源，不过目录有问题，网站目录页面每五章不给正文的url，要进上一章的正文里去找。

ruleContent.content:
<js>
    let customDelaySecondsStr = book.getVariable("custom");
    if (customDelaySecondsStr && customDelaySecondsStr.trim() !== "" && !isNaN(parseInt(customDelaySecondsStr))) {
        let bin = book.durChapterIndex;
        let cin = chapter.index;
        let inn = cin - bin;
        let sleep = Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep;
        if (inn > 3 || inn < -3) {
            sleep(customDelaySecondsStr * 1000);
        }
    }
    result
</js>
<js>
    result = java.hexDecodeToString(result);
    let respone;
    let contentData = result.split("----");
    if (contentData[0] == "1") {
        //正常页面
        respone = java.get(book.bookUrl + contentData[1] + ".html", { "Content-Type": "application/json", "Accept": "application/json, text/plain, */*" }).body();
    }
    else {
        //没有正文url页面，到上一章找下一章的url
        respone = java.get(book.bookUrl + contentData[1] + ".html", { "Content-Type": "application/json", "Accept": "application/json, text/plain, */*" }).body();
        let Jsoup = Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup;
        let doc = Jsoup.parse(respone);
        let nextUrl = "{{source.getKey()}}/" + doc.selectFirst("#next_url").attr("href");
        respone = java.get(nextUrl, { "Content-Type": "application/json", "Accept": "application/json, text/plain, */*" }).body();
    }
    result = respone
</js>
#chaptercontent@html

variableComment:
书源变量填入数字可控制缓存速度，单位秒。
注意：
1、需要设置线程数为1。
2、网站正文如果需要点击下一页的话每一章缓存的时间等于填入的秒数*正文页数。

java.log(v)

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
a = java.get("a");
var urlMatches = a.match(/"url":"(.*?)"/g);
var nameMatches = a.match(/"name":"(.*?)"/g);
var urls = [];
if (urlMatches) {
  for (var i = 0; i < urlMatches.length; i++) {
    var url = urlMatches[i].replace(/"url":"/g, "").replace(/"/g, "");
    urls.push(url);
  }
}
var names = [];
if (nameMatches) {
  for (var j = 0; j < nameMatches.length; j++) {
    var name = nameMatches[j].replace(/"name":"/g, "").replace(/"/g, "");
    names.push(name);
  }
}
var list = [];
var minCount = Math.min(urls.length, names.length);
for (var k = 0; k < minCount; k++) {
  list.push({
    surl: urls[k],
    sname: names[k]
  });
}
JSON.stringify(list);
</js>$.[*]

	var aid = java.androidId();
	var sign = java.md5Encode(aid+timestamp+"9495ef469eb3e7ae8ef3");
	var header = {
		"deviceType":"android",
		"appVersion":"4.78",
		"User-Agent":"okhttp/4.8.0",
		"deviceIdentify":aid,
		"signature":sign,
		"timestamp":timestamp,
		"headerRequestSource":"lianhe"
		};
		return JSON.stringify(header)
})()
</js>

var bes = result.match(/PHA\+[A-Za-z0-9+\/]+={0,2}/g);
//java.log(String(bes))
if (!bes) {
    var ml = java.webView(null,baseUrl,null);
    var txt = java.getString("#txt@html");
    java.longToast("正文解密失败，转为webView动态加载。");
} else {
var result = [];
for (var i = 0; i < bes.length; i++) {
    // 遍历数组，使用阅读内置Base64解码方法
    var bsej = java.base64Decode(bes[i]);
    var txtt = String(bsej);
    result.push(txtt);
      }
	var txt = result.join('\n');
}
txt;
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var bes = result.match(/PHA\+[A-Za-z0-9+\/]+={0,2}/g);
//java.log(String(bes))
if (!bes) {
    var ml = java.webView(null,baseUrl,null);
    var txt = java.getString("#txt@html");
    java.longToast("正文解密失败，转为webView动态加载。");
} else {
var result = [];
for (var i = 0; i < bes.length; i++) {
    // 遍历数组，使用阅读内置Base64解码方法
    var bsej = java.base64Decode(bes[i]);
    var txtt = String(bsej);
    result.push(txtt);
      }
	var txt = result.join('\n');
}
txt;
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
//java.log(baseUrl)
result = java.getElements(".xs_info.-1@ul@li@a").toArray();
let start = 0;
let end = 0;
try {
 start = src.match(/li:nth-child\(\d+\){display:none}/gi).length;
 end = src.match(/li:nth-last-child\(\d+\){display:none}/gi).length;
} catch (err) { }

result = result.slice(start, result.length - end);

result
</js>
ruleToc.chapterName:
text@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var $ = JSON.parse(result).result;
var i = 0, j = 0, pos = 0;
var k = $.chapter.length;
var l = $.page.length;
$.page = $.page.map(no=>Number(no));
while(i<k-1) {
  pos = Number($.chapter[i].pos);
  while(j>0 && $.page[j]>pos) {
    j--;
  }
  $.chapter[i].no = $.page[j]==0 ? "0" : "+"+$.page[j];
  $.chapter[i].page = "Page "+(j+1);
  $.chapter[i].next = [];
  j++;
  pos = Number($.chapter[i+1].pos);
  while($.page[j+1]<=pos) {
    $.chapter[i].next.push($.page[j]);
    j++;
  }
  i++;
}
$.chapter[i].no = "+"+$.page[j];
$.chapter[i].page = "Page "+(j+1);
$.chapter[i].next = [];
while(j<l) {
  $.chapter[i].next.push($.page[j]);
  j++;
}
var index = 0, list = [];
for (i=0; i<k; i++) {
  index = $.chapter.findIndex(it=>it.no==$.chapter[i].no);
  if (i==index) {
    list.push($.chapter[i]);
    j = list.length-1;
  } else {
    list[j].next = list[j].next.concat($.chapter[i].next);
  }
}
JSON.stringify(list);
</js>

ruleContent.content:
if(java.get("is_bundle")=="false"){ html = java.ajax("https://read.douban.com"); eval(html.match(/Ark\.(user = \{[\s\S]+?\})/)[1]); cok = user.id??"anonymous"; java.log("cok: "+cok) t = java.getString("$.data"); script = ``; ddd = java.webView(script,baseUrl,"result"); //规范Json数据 // 定义正则表达式 const pattern = /:"(.*?)"([,\]\}])/g; // 替换逻辑 ddd = String(ddd).replace(pattern, (match, content,suffix) => { // 将内容中的双引号替换为转义字符 const replacedContent = content.replace(/"/g, '\\"'); // 返回替换后的结果 return `:"${replacedContent}"${suffix}`; }).replace(/\n+/g,'\\n').replace(/[\x00-\x1F\x7F]/g,''); var data = JSON.parse(String(ddd)); function extractContent(item) { const textList = item.data?.text; const process = (content) => { if (typeof content === 'string') { return content; } if (Array.isArray(content)) { return content.map(process).join(''); } if (content && content.content) { return process(content.content); } return ''; }; return typeof textList === 'string' ? textList : process(textList); } function getChapterContent(chapterNumber) { let chapterContent = []; let currentChapter = -1; let isFirstHeadlineFound = false; for (let i = 0; i < data.length; i++) { let item = data[i]; if (item.type === 'headline') { currentChapter++; if (!isFirstHeadlineFound) { isFirstHeadlineFound = true; } if (currentChapter > chapterNumber) { break; } } if ((currentChapter === chapterNumber) || (chapterNumber === 0 && !isFirstHeadlineFound && item.type !== 'headline')) { if(item.type === "illus")chapterContent.push(`\n`); if(item.type !== 'headline')chapterContent.push(extractContent(item)); } } return chapterContent.length > 0 ? chapterContent.join('\n') : null; } result = ""; // 检查是否需要使用章节逻辑 if (book.bookUrl.includes("ebook")) { let index = chapter.index; result = getChapterContent(index); } else { // 遍历数据，提取并拼接 content data.forEach(item => { if(item.type === "illus")result += `\n` result += extractContent(item) + "\n"; // 每个段落换行 }); } }else{ bookName = java.getString("@class.article-title@text"); bookAuthor = java.getString("@class.author-item@text"); imgSrc = java.getString("@class.cover shadow-cover@img@src"); info = java.getString("@class.info@p@text"); result = `❗️刷新本章跳转加入书架界面❗️\n书名：${bookName}\n作者：${bookAuthor}\n\n简介：\n${info}` if(book.durChapterIndex === chapter.index){ url = "legado://import/addToBookshelf?src="+baseUrl; script = `data:text/html;charset=utf-8, 《${bookName}》加入书架

跳转加入书架

简介：${info}

`; java.startBrowser(script,"《"+bookName+"》") } } result

ruleContent.nextContentUrl:
<js>
hi=java.get("hi");
hia=hi.match(/pageStart=(\d+)/)[1]
//java.log(hia)
a = java.get("c");
b=String(a).replace(/\[(.*)\]/,'$1').replace(/\"/g,'').replace(/\s/g,'');
//java.log(b)
if (typeof b == 'string') {
    b = b.split(','); 
}
//java.log(nextChapterUrl)
c = nextChapterUrl.match(/pageStart= {0,1}(\d+)/);
c = parseInt(c[1]); 
results = [];
for (i = 0; i < b.length; i++) {
        currentPage = parseInt(b[i]);
        if (isNaN(currentPage)) {
            continue;
        }
        if (currentPage > c) {
            break;
        }
        if (currentPage > hia && currentPage < c) {
            url = baseUrl.replace(/(pageStart=)\d+/, '$1' + currentPage);
            results.push(url);
        }
    }results
</js>

<js>
var $ = JSON.parse(result).result;
var i = 0, j = 0, ch = {};
var k = $.chapter.length;
var l = $.page.length;
var b=$.page
$.c=java.log(JSON.stringify(b))
java.put("c",$.c)
while(j<l) {
  if (i<k) {
    ch = $.chapter[i];
    while(+ch.pos>$.page[j]) {
      ch.no = $.page[j];
      ch.page = "Page "+(j+1);
      $.page[j] = ch;
      j++;
    }
    i++;
  } else {
    ch = $.chapter[k-1];
    ch.no = $.page[j];
    ch.page = "Page "+(j+1);
    $.page[j] = ch;
    j++;
  }
}
JSON.stringify($.page);
</js>

ruleBookInfo.tocUrl:
<js>
url=baseUrl.replace(/book/,'chapter');
m=java.ajax(url);
re=String(m).match(/[\s\S]*data-p.*?(\d+)[\s\S]*?\/ul>/)[1]
java.put("m",re)
if(baseUrl.match(/fanqxsw/)){
	java.getString('text.章节目录@href')
	}else if (baseUrl.match(/kanshudashi/)){		a=baseUrl.match(/book\/(.*?)\./)[1];
b=`https://www.kanshudashi.com/index.php?action=loadChapterPage,{"method":"post","body": "id=${a}&page=1"}`;
}else if (baseUrl.match(/kelexs/)){
		a=baseUrl.match(/book\/(.*?)\./)[1];
b=`https://www.kelexs.com/index.php?action=loadChapterPage,{"method":"post","body": "id=${a}&page=1"}`;
}
</js>

	result=java.getElements("$.data[*]")

if(String(result).match(/\<a\>/)){
	result=java.getElements("class.list font18 chapListBody@ul@li@a")
	}else{
		result=java.getElements("$.data[*]")
		}
}
		//java.log(result)
		result
</js>
ruleToc.nextTocUrl:
<js>
m=java.get("m");
if(baseUrl.match(/fanqx/)){
var a = baseUrl.match(/\/chapter\/(.*?)\.html/);
//java.log(a[1]);
let hrefList = [];
if (a) {
  var b = result.match(/data\-p\="\d+"/g).length;
  if (b) {
    for(let i = 1; i <= b; i++) {
      let href = `https://www.fanqxsw.com/index.php?action=loadChapterPage,{"body":"id=${a[1]}&page=${i}","method":"POST"}`;
     //java.log(href);
      hrefList.push(href);
    }
    hrefList
     }
}
}else {
list=[]
if(JSON.parse(result).data.length>0){
	for (i = 2; i <= m; i++){
	list.push(baseUrl.replace(/page=(\d+)/,'page=' +i))
		}
		list
	}
	}

</js>

<js>
base = baseUrl;
id = baseUrl.match(/(\d+\/)/)[1]
java.put("id",id)
lis = java.getElements('#list-chapterAll@dd');
var list = [];

for (var i = 0; i < lis.length; i++) {
     var href = lis[i].select('a').attr('href');
     var text = lis[i].text();
     if (href==0) {
        if ( i < lis.length - 1 ) {
            var url = "https://www.baidu.com/" + id + lis[i + 1].select('a').attr('href');         
        } else {
            var url = "https://cn.bing.com/" + id + lis[i - 1].select('a').attr('href');
        }
     } else { var url = base + href; }
     java.log(lis[i].text()+":"+url);
     list.push({"text": text, "href": url});
}

list
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: $.author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
result = JSON.parse(decode(result)).result.book;
//result = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(result));

burl=source.getKey().match(/([^#]*)/)[1];
id = result.id;

source_url= burl + `/cdn/book/source/${id}.html`;
$ =java.ajax(source_url);
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
$ = JSON.parse(decode($)).result.list;
n=0;//默认选择源
v=String(book.getVariable("custom"));
x=v.match(/^\d+$/)?v:n;
x=parseInt(x)<$.length?x:n;

result.new_title = $[x].new_title;

if($.length>1){
		y = '\n📌使用说明： 根据序号设置书籍变量来切换来源(默认0)，若书籍ID为0 (9x除外)，则为第三方网站。\n🎯当前源：序号🔺'+x+'🔻【'+$[x].name+'】'+(x==0?' (默认)':'');
for(i in $){
		y += '\n❤序号🔺'+i+'🔻【'+$[i].name+'】\n书籍ID：'+$[i].internal_book_id+'\n选用率：'+$[i].show_text+' \n源地址： '+$[i].chapter_list_url+'\n最新章节： '+$[i].new_title;
	}
result.description += y
}

try{ book_id=$[x].internal_book_id; }
 catch(e) { book_id = id;}
 
 if(x==0&&book_id==0){ 
 	book_id = id;
 	java.put('book_id',book_id);
 	result.tocUrl = `/cdn/book/chapterList/${book_id}.html`;
 }
else if(x!=0&&book_id==0) {
	 tUrl = $[x].chapter_list_url;
	 result.tocUrl = tUrl+"," + JSON.stringify({"headers":{"Referer": tUrl}});
	}
else if(book_id!=0){ 
	java.put('book_id',book_id);
		result.tocUrl = `/cdn/book/chapterList/${book_id}.html`;
	}

result = JSON.stringify(result);
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
if(baseUrl.match(/cdn\/book\/chapterList/)){
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
data = JSON.parse(decode(result)).result.list;
length = data.length;
chapterList = [];
for(var i = 0; i < length; i ++){
	name = "🏮〖"+data[i].name+"〗🏮";
	chapterList.push({
			text: name,
			href: null,
			volume: true
	})	
	data[i].list.forEach(($) => {						
		text = $.name;
		id = $.id;
		book_id = java.get('book_id');
		//book_id = baseUrl.match(/\/(\d+).html/)[1];
    href = `/cdn/book/content/${book_id}/${id}.html`;   
    chapterList.push({
			text: text,
			href: href	
	})
	})	
	}
chapterList
}
else{
	chapterList = [];
	datas = java.getElement("dd@a").toArray();
	//java.log(JSON.stringify(chapterList));
	for (var i = 0; i < datas.length; i++) {
    text = datas[i].text();
			hre = baseUrl.split(',')[0]+datas[i].attr("href");
			d=String(hre).split('\/');
list=[];
d.forEach((s, index)=>{ 
	 if (list.indexOf(s) == -1) {
 	   list.push(s);      }
		
		});
		href = list.toString().replace(/,/g,"/");
						
     chapterList.push({
		 	 text: text,
		  	 href: href	
      	})            
   };
	chapterList
	}
</js>
